channel.title: ai on Software
channel.description: Recent content in ai on Software

item.title: AI concept
item.description: Large Language Model (LLM) Features is a general term is a model trained on vast amount of text data to understand and generate human-like language is designed to perform tasks like text generation, question answering, translation, summarisation, etc. GPT-4 and ChatGPT both are LLM ChatGPT Features is a specific instance of an LLM based on the GPT architecture is designed to generate human-like text, respond to user queries, and engage in conversation, etc.
